MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH3 postcode area of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.00pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:41pm on Wednesday, 31 March 2021
